Name: Gamebook Edgar A. Poe: The Oval Portrait
About the game: Put on your headphones, close your eyes and watch the story in your imagination... The wisdom that we get from the “already told” stories makes us deeply feel that we cannot hide from the inevitable (*). ⠀ ⠀ Be an active participant in a story true to the original. Play the role intended for you by the master Edgar Allan Poe. and uncover the dark secret behind the portrait of a muse. The show must go on... in the right way. Make choices and follow the illustrative sounds and music. Images arise and disappear in the fumes of the gothic atmosphere. Experience the story as realistically as your imagination allows you to. ⠀ ⠀  ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀    Story mode ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀You decide when to unfold the rest of the story. ⠀ ⠀  ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀    Explore mode ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀Follow the music to discover locations and push the action forward. ⠀ ⠀ ⠀ We strongly recommend using headphones for the full 3d audio environment experience. ⠀ ⠀ Audio-active production is free , expected adventure time is 30 minutes. ⠀ ⠀ (*) Inspired by: Umberto Eco “I nuovi mezzi di comunicazione e il destino del libro”.
